tweet_text:
@_andyboardman @zachdcarter The question is, does "budget authority" in section 504 of FCRA include the authority to re-lend loan repayments, or to borrow against an appropriation? 

CBO appears to say budget authority means only the ability to spend an appropriation. https://t.co/ntL79zkVrj
text_en: The question is, does "budget authority" in section of FCRA include the authority to re-lend loan repayments, or to borrow against an appropriation? CBO appears to say budget authority means only the ability to spend an appropriation.
reply_text: The question is, does "budget authority" in section of FCRA include the authority to re-lend loan repayments, or to borrow against an appropriation? CBO appears to say budget authority means only the ability to spend an appropriation.
